actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to prevent the abuse of certain pension plan provisions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 through the use of separate corporations or other organizations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to aggregate employees of an adjunct professional organization and the employees of the professional organizations which are related to such adjunct professional organization for purposes of determining the eligibility of such organizations to participate in tax-qualified pension plans.

titles.title: A bill to prevent the abuse of certain pension plan provisions of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 through the use of separate corporations or other organizations.
